mutants.code:
from dateutil.parser import parse

def find_half_age_date(birthdate1: str, birthdate2: str) -> str:
    p1 = parse(birthdate1)
    p2 = parse(birthdate2)
    if p1 >= p2:
        (p1, p2) = (p2, p1)
    half_age_date = p2 + (p2 - p1)
    return str(half_age_date)[:10]

from dateutil.parser import parse

def find_half_age_date(birthdate1: str, birthdate2: str) -> str:
    p1 = parse(birthdate1)
    p2 = parse(birthdate2)
    if p1 <= p2:
        (p1, p2) = (p2, p1)
    half_age_date = p2 + (p2 - p1)
    return str(half_age_date)[:10]

from dateutil.parser import parse

def find_half_age_date(birthdate1: str, birthdate2: str) -> str:
    p1 = parse(birthdate1)
    p2 = parse(birthdate2)
    if p1 != p2:
        (p1, p2) = (p2, p1)
    half_age_date = p2 + (p2 - p1)
    return str(half_age_date)[:10]

from dateutil.parser import parse

def find_half_age_date(birthdate1: str, birthdate2: str) -> str:
    p1 = parse(birthdate1)
    p2 = parse(birthdate2)
    if p1 > p2:
        (p1, p2) = (p2, p1)
    half_age_date = p2 - (p2 - p1)
    return str(half_age_date)[:10]

from dateutil.parser import parse

def find_half_age_date(birthdate1: str, birthdate2: str) -> str:
    p1 = parse(birthdate1)
    p2 = parse(birthdate2)
    if p1 > p2:
        (p1, p2) = (p2, p1)
    half_age_date = p2 * (p2 - p1)
    return str(half_age_date)[:10]

from dateutil.parser import parse

def find_half_age_date(birthdate1: str, birthdate2: str) -> str:
    p1 = parse(birthdate1)
    p2 = parse(birthdate2)
    if p1 > p2:
        (p1, p2) = (p2, p1)
    half_age_date = p2 + (p2 + p1)
    return str(half_age_date)[:10]

from dateutil.parser import parse

def find_half_age_date(birthdate1: str, birthdate2: str) -> str:
    p1 = parse(birthdate1)
    p2 = parse(birthdate2)
    if p1 > p2:
        (p1, p2) = (p2, p1)

    return str(half_age_date)[:-10]
